mapper.update: update sys_user u set u.user_name = #{userName}, u.password = #{password1}, u.unencrypted_password = #{password}, u.salt = #{salt} where u.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.delete: update sys_user set del_flag = 1 where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: select * from sys_user where (user_name = #{username} or email = #{username} or mobile = #{username})
select m.perms from sys_user_menu ur left join sys_menu m on ur.menu_id = m.menu_id where ur.user_id = #{userId}
select m.name from sys_user_menu ur left join sys_menu m on ur.menu_id = m.menu_id where ur.user_id = #{userId}
select distinct menu_id from sys_user_menu where user_id = #{userId}

select u.user_id, u.mobile, u.unencrypted_password as unencryptedPassword from sys_user u
u.del_flag = 0 and u.user_id != 1
order by u.create_date desc

SELECT u.user_id, u.user_name, u.password, u.email, u.mobile, u.city as "city", u.identity, u.id_number, u.login_name, u.gender, u.is_certified as "isCertified", u.unencrypted_password as unencryptedPassword FROM sys_user u
u.user_id = #{userId}
